content.rendered:
Manus – Effortless Virtual Reality

Specializing in high-fidelity finger tracking for Motion Capture and VR.

Manus was established in October 2014. Together with eleven other participants, Manus was selected from 10,000 candidates which took part in the Dutch Startup Bootcamp HighTechXL. The program helped Manus accelerate and build the business in just three months.

After the program’s Demo Day in February 2015, the company signed up leading development partners and clients. Manus was fully funded within a month, enabling the company to further develop the product.

Contact Us

Phone

03 9687 8638

Address

7A Kent Street,
Yarraville, VIC 3013
Australia.

Send a Message

    • Manus Prime X Marker Mocap

      Read More
    • Manus Professional Tracker
      Manus Professional Tracker SteamVR Pro Tracker The Manus Pro Tracker is a professional SteamVR tracker...
      Read More
    • Manus Polygon
      Introducing the Manus Polygon ecosystem. A range of products aimed at capturing full body movements and translating...
      Read More

    Want To Know More?

    Our team of Mocap professionals are just an email or a phone call away.
